answers.answer: Interesting screen name.Remember feeling like a crazy teenager with all those weird things going on just like you're describing.  Thought mine was not normal then either and of course found out it wasn't.  I was 25 before I got help for my bp.  You need to find a good therapist and get in to see them.Talk to your parents calmly and rationally and tell them what you're going through on the inside.  Ask them for help.  They will hopefully get you the help you need.  Gather info on the web or on here about it being just like diabetes.  Diabetics don't produce the insulin they need or their bodies use it wrong.  The same with bp.  Our brains don't produse seratonin or dopamine in the right amounts or they use it wrong.  Someone said on here the other day they call it the diabetes of the brain.  I REALLY like it ananolgy.Good luck and if you need someone to talk to in private send me a personal message any time.Dac

question: Depression is my topic. But that's only half of it. I'm 15 years old and I think there's something wrong with me. Lately I've been really depressed. Somedays I wake up and automatically I just feel down. Other days I wake up and everything seems great. I don't eat as much as I use to. Sometimes it's hard for me to fall asleep. Other times I'm just extremly tired. When I feel happy or fine or whatever I think a lot about a whole bunch of stuff and people say I talk really fast when I'm hyper. Also, I get angry at nothing. My mom could say I look nice and I'd get extremly angry I'd just want to go do something horrible. I don't know. This could all just be in my head since I am a teenager. But I feel like this isn't normal acting and thinking the way I do. There's a lot more but I don't really feel comfortable typing it all online. If anyone can help me please do. I'm really confused and don't want to tell anyone because they'll think I'm doing it for attention or think I'm stupid. Plus, when I get angry my sister calls me bi polar. My mom calls me a pyro when I play with her lighter. I don't know if that has anything to do with this but it could help...
title: Is Anything Wrong With Me?
